name: ATI 42
overview: Pilot of the Exelair company, you will ensure, at the controls of your ATI 42, regular connections between the aerodromes of West Paris. You will have the choice between three flight levels with the possibility of undergoing the effects of the winds and you will be able to land on twelve aerodromes of different approach difficulties. A final score will appreciate your flight performance. Remember that pilots show a lot of mastery. Good flight!
